channel.title: Getting Started with Django on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started with Django on David J Nevin

item.title: Django in Depth
item.description: Django 4 by Example by Antonio Mele is a great book.

item.title: Django Users, Login & Registration
item.description: The user functionality is created in a seperate app. This project uses built-in user functionality to keep things managable for my first attempts.

item.title: Django Delete Items
item.description: Deleting a listing Again we follow the same pattern as before.

item.title: Django Edit Items
item.description: Editing items in the PostgreSQL DB The pattern now is as before.

item.title: Django Individual Item Page
item.description: Next step is to setup an individual item page. This tutorial is giving me a some good insights into the Critique Wheel rewrite.

item.title: Django Dynamic Content
item.description: Day 2: Dynamic Content A few useful django db queries:

item.title: Django Next Steps
item.description: Poetry and Django So poetry is up and running. Django is up and running, and I’ve added a simple listing app into the Django project.

item.title: Django Games First Steps
item.description: Getting a project up and running I had an interesting conversation this morning with Bob from Pybites.
